Package Control

Class TableListControl

java.lang.Object
Control.TableListControl
public class TableListControl extends Object
This class contains the functions used to control the list of tables.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    BACK_OPTION
    Number to press to go back in table list page.

  • Field Details

    • BACK_OPTION

      public static final int BACK_OPTION
      Number to press to go back in table list page.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • TableListControl

      public TableListControl()

  • Method Details

    • editTable

      public static void editTable()
      Edits the list of tables.

    • addTable

      private static void addTable()
      Create a new Table and adds it to the list.

    • deleteTable

      private static void deleteTable()
      Remove table from the list according to the ID.

    • getTable

      public static Table getTable​(int ID)
      Gets the Table object with the requested ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the table.
      Returns:
      the Table object, null if table ID is invalid.

    • allocateTable

      public static void allocateTable()
      Allocates a table to a customer.
      If customer has a reservation, the reserved table will the allocated.
      Else, a table will only be allocated if there is an available table.

    • clearTable

      public static void clearTable()
      Prints the invoice for the chosen table.
      Sets the table as available.

    • chooseTable

      public static Table chooseTable​(int pax)
      Allocates an available table that can accommodate the provided number of pax.
      Parameters:
      pax - the number of pax to allocate.
      Returns:
      the Table object allocated to the customer, null if there are no suitable tables.

    • updateTables

      private static void updateTables()
      Updates the status of the reservation according to the current time.

    • allEmpty

      public static boolean allEmpty()
      Checks whether all the tables are available.
      Returns:
      true if all tables are available, false otherwise.

    • checkTableDetails

      public static void checkTableDetails()
      Prints the list of tables.

    • printOccupied

      public static void printOccupied()
      Prints the list of occupied tables.

    • printAllTables

      public static void printAllTables()
      Prints the list of tables.

    • generateInvoice

      public static void generateInvoice​(Table table, boolean member)
      Prints the invoice for a table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to print the invoice for.
      member - true if customer is a member, false otherwise.

    • printBasicDetails

      public static void printBasicDetails​(Table table)
      Prints the basic details of a table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to print the details for.

    • printTableDetails

      public static void printTableDetails​(Table table)
      Prints more in-depth detail of the specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to print details for.

    • reserve

      public static void reserve​(Table table, Reservation reservation)
      Reserves a table for the customer.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to reserve.
      reservation - the details of the reservation.

    • assign

      public static void assign​(Table table, Customer customer)
      Allocates a table to the customer.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to assign to the customer.
      customer - the customer that has been allocated to this table.

    • available

      public static void available​(Table table)
      Sets a table as available.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to set as available.

    • saveTableList

      public static void saveTableList()
      Saves the list of tables.
